position: Development Engineer at Standard Chartered Bank

experience.title: Development Engineer
experience.description: • Contributed to the Singapore ACH payments project for the new Direct Debit payment flow. Played a key role from the initial stages, including completing user stories, progressing through SIT and UVT, and successfully transitioning to production. • Provided support for production issues by conducting detailed root cause analyses (RCA).

experience.title: Technology Intern
experience.description: • Developed Python webpage using Django framework for maintaining risks for releases and a webpage to load the details of DownTime• Co-ordinated with scrum teams to get feedback, necessary data related to downtime and used MySQL to store the data into database• Implemented python webpage functionalities like add, update, delete using HTML, CSS and Javascript.
